name: Raz & Kibou's Gallery
description:
Controls : WASD                             movement P                                         pause Q                                        open sticker placement menu mouse wheel              change sticker graphic left mouse button   place sticker K/L                                    sticker becomes  bigger/smaller CTRG                              open color wheel
RAZ&Kibou Gallery is an interactive show room with a beautiful atmosphere, where
you can watch art or make nonsene with the placeable stickers.   If you like, you can change the color of the light or look in the sky.

It was  successfully tested in the Chrome Browser and works in all  platforms,

background music by:  https://www.youtube.com/c/AimToHeadOfficial

art by RazTheFrog and Kibou Njorthrbairt

https://www.instagram.com/kibou_njorthrbairt/                             https://www.instagram.com/razthefrog/

link to the  instagram page you can also find in the program, 
Simply watch for the instagram logos.
